overview:
Stuart N. Steinberg is Chief Executive Officer at VideoCells Ltd.

With a proven track record of over 18 years in international sales and business development, Steinberg served as VP Business Development at Electronics Line 3000, Chief Corporate Officer of Visual Defence, and served as Vice President of Sales at TradeConnection Technology NV, which is part of the Formula Systems group (NASDAQ: FORTY). Previous to this assignment at TradeConnection Technology NV, Steinberg worked with New Dimension Software, a NASDAQ-traded company acquired in 1999 by BMC Software (NYSE: BMC) in a $680 million cash transaction. At New Dimension, and later at BMC, Steinberg served as both Director of European Business Development and Director of Human Resources and Operations of the ITPA business unit.
